item.title: Tameka add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "You spend your life getting walked on, you learn to recognize the tread." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "Life is like a moustache. It can be wonderful or terrible. But it always tickles." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "When someone shows you who they are believe them; the first time." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "I've learned that you can tell a lot about a person by the way (s)he handles these three things: a rainy day, lost luggage, and tangled Christmas tree lights." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "To give pleasure to a single heart by a single act is better than a thousand heads bowing in prayer." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "You must stay drunk on writing so reality cannot destroy you." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Caprice Crane
item.description: "Yesterday I had a woman ask me what kind of salad dressings we have. I told her we have sesame soy dressing, spicy lime vinaigrette, and blue cheese. She made a face and asked, 'Is that all?' 'Yes,' I told her, 'those are all of our dressings.' 'Don't you have any other dressings?' he says. I mean, what the hell? What does she think? That I'm holding out? I was tempted to say, "No, we actually have an entirely different assortment of dressings that I don't tell people about the first time they ask, because they don't deserve these great secret dressings. But now that you have proven your worth, I will show you to the VIP room, where the array of salad dressings will dazzle and delight you." -- Caprice Crane

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "You used to be much more..."muchier." You've lost your muchness." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The unreal is more powerful than the real. Because nothing is as perfect as you can imagine it. Because its only intangible ideas, concepts, beliefs, fantasies that last. Stone crumbles. Wood rots. People, well, they die. But things as fragile as a thought, a dream, a legend, they can go on and on. If you can change the way people think. The way they see themselves. The way they see the world. You can change the way people live their lives. That's the only lasting thing you can create." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Daphne du Maurier
item.description: "The peace of Manderley. The quietude and the grace. Whoever lived within its walls, whatever trouble there was and strife, however much uneasiness and pain, no matter what tears were shed, what sorrows borne, the peace of Manderley could not be broken or the loveliness destroyed." -- Daphne du Maurier

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "I wrote the story myself. It's about a girl who lost her reputation and never missed it." -- Mae West

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Tameka add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Tameka add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "He must have known I'd want to leave you." "No, he must have known you would always want to come back." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Jandy Nelson
item.description: "That's a misconception, Lennie. The sky is everywhere, it begins at your feet." -- Jandy Nelson

item.title: Tameka add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "The more you know who you are, and what you want, the less you let things upset you." -- Stephanie Perkins
